places_to_visit.name: Stanley Park
places_to_visit.description: Stanley Park is a large urban park offering scenic views, walking and biking trails, and attractions like the Vancouver Aquarium. The park's seawall provides a stunning waterfront experience.

places_to_visit.name: Granville Island
places_to_visit.description: Granville Island is a vibrant cultural district known for its public market, artisan shops, and theaters. It’s a great place to sample local food, shop for unique crafts, and enjoy street performances.

places_to_visit.name: Capilano Suspension Bridge
places_to_visit.description: The Capilano Suspension Bridge is a thrilling experience that spans a deep gorge. The bridge, along with the treetop walkways and the Cliffwalk, offers stunning views of the surrounding forest.

places_to_visit.name: Grouse Mountain
places_to_visit.description: Grouse Mountain provides outdoor activities year-round, including hiking, skiing, and zip-lining. The Grouse Skyride offers panoramic views of Vancouver and the surrounding mountains.
